title: NFL ATL: Week 11 MNF recap, TNF preview
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Week 11 MNF recap, TNF preview
description:
A room full of heroes, Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling breakdown the Week 11 victory for Cam Newton and the Carolina Panthers over the New England Patriots on “Monday Night Football.” Get caught up with the latest headlines from around the league and find out which three unlucky teams join the forked club.  The crew also previews the Week 12 “Thursday Night Football” matchup between the New Orleans Saints and Atlanta Falcons. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
